page.title: 11BRIDGE OF WEIR - CONCERNS
page.content: Today people are concerned about a number of important things. Firstly everyone complains about the way {prices are going up,}especially petrol.{Wages do not buy as much}as they used to. Also{unemployment is {getting worse}everywhere, and people worry about their jobs. Parents are most concerned about violence. Most will not allow their children to wander after dark. {Football hooliganism}is often reported in the news. Some people think that there is{too much violence}on television and it is encouraging young people to cause trouble. { The belt was banned in schools}but now many people are worried about discipline.{Should the belt be brought {back ?}Many of them think so. Perhaps that would help the problem of violence.
